criterion: Provides surgical procedures as the primary solution for mild snoring
Encourages the user to consult a professional for further guidance
Uses technical jargon or overly complex language
Fails to mention lifestyle changes or self-care strategies that can help alleviate snoring
Correctly explains the causes of snoring and its potential health implications
Provides additional resources or references for further reading
Uses a condescending or judgmental tone
Suggests keeping a sleep diary to track snoring patterns
Incorrectly states that snoring is not a significant health concern
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's snoring concerns
